fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Corrode a player during the night, dealing an Unstoppable Attack.
- Possess a player during the night (1-shot)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will deal anyone who visits you a Powerful Attack.
- When you possess a player, you will die from a Modkill level attack and convert them to SCP-035 without access to the Possess ability.
